name: GeoSPARQL Topology: RCC8 Properties
abstract: Properties which can be used to describe the topology of geometries using RCC8 relations

examples.title: rcc8eq relation example
examples.content: A feature is related to itself using the geo:rcc8eq relation.

examples.title: rcc8dc relation example
examples.content: A feature is related to another feature using the geo:rcc8dc relation.
